attributes.action: Realese weekly the Yellow Card statistics as regards the Covid-19 Vaccinations.
attributes.additional_details: So the figures are publicly accessible and as the figures would be released through Parliament there could/would be no question as to the legitimacy of the data.
attributes.background:
So the public can make an INFORMED decision about taking the Medical Procedure (Covid-Vaccine), i want the Health Secretary to realese the statistics for Deaths, Injuries form the "Yellow Card" scheme, as regards the Covid-19 Vaccines.
And these statistics to be publicly announced.
